ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Writing & registering a DecideRule
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you, Gordon!  That s just what I needed. BTW: What are the possible types for the parameter Object in: public Object decisionFor(Object object) { }

Thank you, Gordon!  That's just what I needed.

BTW: What are the possible types for the parameter Object in:

public Object decisionFor(Object object) { }

Thanks again,

Scott Ganyo
Actor, Producer, Technologist
www.scottganyo.com
310.359.8728

Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art. -  
Leonardo da Vinci

On Feb 12, 2009, at 12:11 PM, Gordon Mohr wrote:

> The best approach is to pick a similar DecideRule and use it as a  
> model.
>
> The method for making it appear in the web UI varies between 1.14.x  
> and
> 2.0.x.
>
> In 1.14.x, it involves making sure a 'DecideRule.options' file with  
> your
> new class(es) is found on the classpath. Here are two old threads with
> more info:
>
> http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/4142
> http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/4578
>
> A similar procedure but with a '[classname].subclasses' file applies  
> in
> 2.0.x and is mentioned here:
>
> http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/5268
>
> (Also in 2.0, you can type the fully-qualified name of any class on  
> the
> classpath to add it in the web UI.)
>
> The approach may change slightly again in 2.2 and beyond, but we will
> definitely maintain the ability to type the full name of any desired
> class to include it in the configuration.
>
> - Gordon @ IA
>
> Scott Ganyo wrote:
> > Hey guys!
> >
> > I'm new at the Heritrix game (and to this forum), so I apologize  
> in advance if I've missed
> > something in the documentation or in prior discussions, but I  
> can't figure out how to write
> > and install a custom DecideRule in Heritrix. Can somebody point me  
> to some information on
> > this? I'd greatly appreciate it.
> >
> > Thank you!
> > Scott
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > ------------------------------------
> >
> > Yahoo! Groups Links
> >
> >
> >
>
> 


--Apple-Mail-38-619357616
